meanings.definition: A large muscle at the front of the thigh, divided into four parts.
meanings.sent1: The quadricep helps us walk and run.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her quadricep after exercising.
meanings.sent3: The quadricep decided to take a break from all the walking.
meanings.sent4: His quadricep was as strong as a steel cable.
meanings.sent5: The quadricep muscle bulged with each step he took.

meanings.definition: A muscle group consisting of four muscles located at the front of the thigh.
meanings.sent1: The quadricep group is essential for leg strength.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often focus on strengthening their quadricep muscles.
meanings.sent3: The quadricep group had a meeting to discuss workout plans.
meanings.sent4: Her quadricep muscles were like a team working together.
meanings.sent5: The quadricep muscle group powered him through the race.
